examples.example: 我泡了一壶清香扑鼻的茶，与朋友共享这美好的时光。

translate.english: I made a pot of tea with a refreshing fragrance and shared this wonderful time with friends.

examples.example: 我精心准备了一壶香醇的咖啡，与家人一起度过温馨的时光。

translate.english: I carefully prepared a pot of mellow coffee and spent a warm time with my family.

examples.example: 我煮了一壶热气腾腾的咖啡，享受着悠闲的下午时光。

translate.english: I brewed a pot of steaming hot coffee and enjoyed the leisurely afternoon time.
